product_overview: Pendingsystem is a Next.js-based logistics management platform tailored for automotive service centers, enabling seamless tracking of part lifecycles, customer bookings, and order workflows in real time.
core_goals: Centralize all pending parts tracking in one system
Automate routine operations and status updates
Provide real-time visibility across all stages of the workflow
Enable efficient customer communication and scheduling
Maintain comprehensive audit trails for compliance
key_features: Orders Management with bulk import, editing, attachment support, and duplicate validation
Main Sheet Inventory Tracking with part lifecycle status, auto-move workflow, and bulk operations
Customer Communication via Call List with call status tracking and communication logging
Premium Booking System supporting multi-customer VIN grouping and visual calendar interface
Archive & History retention for 48 hours with compliance-based archived reasons and immutable records
Responsive Notification System with numbered badges and direct navigation to items
Advanced Cross-tab Search functionality across VIN, Customer Name, Part Number, and Company
Configurable Settings & UI customization with history restoration and auto-cleaning capabilities
user_flow_summary: Import or add orders into the Orders Management module with attachments and validation
Commit orders to the Main Sheet for tracking part status through the lifecycle
Automatically move parts through statuses when conditions are met, with visual indicators
Manage customer calls via Call List, track communication and move customers to booking appointments
Schedule appointments using the premium calendar, supporting multi-VIN grouping and booking history
Archive completed workflows retaining history for 48 hours with documented reasons
Search and navigate across all modules using a powerful cross-tab search interface
Receive notifications with actionable badges that link directly to relevant parts or bookings
validation_criteria: All core modules (Orders, Main Sheet, Booking, Call List, Archive) must be functional with workflows operating correctly
Automated lifecycle transitions occur without errors and users receive visual feedback
Cross-module search and navigation should yield accurate and direct results
Performance benchmarks include sub-100ms UI response and no degradation with large datasets
User training time capped under 2 hours with ease of common operations within three clicks
Data integrity maintained throughout all CRUD operations and history retention guidelines met

features.name: Orders Management
features.description: Manage new part requests and initial order staging with bulk import, editing, and attachment support.

features.name: Main Sheet
features.description: Track part status through lifecycle (Pending → Arrived → Available → Call List) with auto-move workflow.

features.name: Booking System
features.description: Premium calendar interface for scheduling customer appointments with multi-customer VIN grouping.

features.name: Call List
features.description: Manage customer contact queue with call status tracking and communication logging.

features.name: Archive & History
features.description: Maintain 48-hour historical retention with archived reasons for compliance.

features.name: API Endpoint - Trigger Backup
features.description: Triggers GitHub Actions workflow to backup reports.

features.name: Data Grid
features.description: Advanced data grid functionality with sorting, filtering, and virtualization.

features.name: Search Functionality
features.description: Cross-tab search across VIN, Customer Name, Part Number, and Company.
